metadata.title: CVE-2018-18651 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Xpdf 4.00. catalog->getNumPages() in AcroForm.ccallows attackers to launch a denial of service (hang caused by large loop)via a specific pdf file, as demonstrated by pdftohtml. This is mainlycaused by a large number after the /Count field in the file.

criterions.comment: ipe package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
